alert.note: Alert for Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 30 at 2:50PM EDT until October 01 at 10:24PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Manatee River Near Myakka Head at SR 64 affecting Manatee County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Bartow affecting Polk County. .Heavy rainfall associated with Hurricane Ian continues to cause major flooding issues along many area rivers. For the Manatee...including Myakka Head at SR 64, Rye Bridge...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Peace...including Bartow, Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Manatee River Near Myakka Head at SR 64. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Low sections of State Road 64 start to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EDT Friday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM EDT Friday was 18.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 7.4 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.3 feet on 09/16/2009. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Manatee River Myakka Head at SR 11.0 15.2 Fri 2 pm 11.2 9.1 7.4 6.4 5.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 600 AM EDT.
